message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I'm new here. I want to create an account, but I'm not sure what I need to do to verify my identity.
I completely understand, and I’d be happy to help! Let’s run through security so I can provide you with the correct steps. Can you confirm your full name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Mark Wilson, my email is mark.w@example.com, and my date of birth is April 15, 1992.

Thanks, Mark. That's all correct! To create and verify your account for compliance purposes, you'll need to provide a valid government-issued ID, a recent utility bill confirming your address, and a payment method in your name.
Got it. How do I submit these documents?
You can upload your documents securely via your PlaySure Gaming account portal under the 'Verification' section. Once submitted, our verification team will review them within 24-48 hours.
Alright, I'll do that now. Will I be notified once my account is verified?
Yes, Mark. You’ll receive an email notification once your account verification is complete. If any additional information is required, we’ll reach out to you.
You're very welcome, Mark! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
